name: @hyperledger/cactus-plugin-keychain-vault
description: A keychain implementation storing its entries in Hashicorp Vault. Actual logic is implemented in Rust.

scripts.generate-client-grpc-web: docker run --user "$(id -u):$(id -g)" --rm -v "${PWD}../../../:/cactus/" protoc --plugin="protoc-gen-grpc-web=/usr/local/bin/protoc-gen-grpc-web" --grpc-web_out="import_style=typescript,mode=grpcwebtext:/cactus/packages/cactus-plugin-keychain-vault/src/main/typescript/generated/protoc/protoc-gen-grpc-web/" --proto_path=/cactus/packages/cactus-plugin-keychain-vault/src/main/proto/gen/openapi/services --proto_path=/cactus/packages/cactus-plugin-keychain-vault/src/main/proto/gen/openapi/ models/get_keychain_entry_request.proto models/get_keychain_entry_response.proto models/set_keychain_entry_request.proto models/set_keychain_entry_response.proto default_service.proto
scripts.generate-server-grpc-go: docker run --user "$(id -u):$(id -g)" --rm -v "${PWD}../../../:/cactus/" protoc --go_out=/cactus/packages/cactus-plugin-keychain-vault/src/server-grpc/go/ --go_opt=paths=source_relative --go-grpc_out=/cactus/packages/cactus-plugin-keychain-vault/src/server-grpc/go/ --go-grpc_opt=paths=source_relative --proto_path=/cactus/packages/cactus-plugin-keychain-vault/src/main/proto/gen/openapi/services --proto_path=/cactus/packages/cactus-plugin-keychain-vault/src/main/proto/gen/openapi/ models/get_keychain_entry_request.proto models/get_keychain_entry_response.proto models/set_keychain_entry_request.proto models/set_keychain_entry_response.proto default_service.proto

contributors.name: Please add yourself to the list of contributors
